def Output(n):
    if n[1] == 0:
        ones = '1' * (n[2] + 1) if n[2] > 0 else ''
        zeros = '0' * (n[0] + 1) if n[0] > 0 else ''
        return ones + zeros
    one_zero = '01' * (n[1] // 2) + '0' * (n[1] % 2)
    if one_zero[-1] == '0':
        ones = '1' * (n[2] + 1) if n[2] > 0 else '1'
        zeros = '0' * n[0] if n[1] > 0 else ''
        return one_zero + zeros + ones
    ones = ones = '1' * n[2] if n[2] > 0 else ''
    zeros = '0' * (n[0] + 1) if n[1] > 0 else '0'
    return one_zero + ones + zeros
m = int(input())
for i in range(m):
    n = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(Output(n))
